titles.title: SAFETY Act of 2018

To amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to authorize the Secretary of Health and Human Services to consider the potential for misuse and abuse when determining whether to approve certain drugs, and for other purposes.
SAFETY Act of 2018
Saving American Families through Efficacy and Trusted Ways Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

term.name: Department of Health and Human Services
Drug safety, medical device, and laboratory regulation

bill.summary:
Saving American Families through Efficacy and Trusted Ways Act of 2018 or the SAFETY Act of 2018
This bill amends the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to expand the authority of the Food and Drug Administration to refuse or withdraw approval for a new drug application if the drug is unsafe due to the risk of abuse or misuse.
